name: Don't Let it Fall!
description:
Swipe the ball to the right or to the left to prevent it from falling into the hole!

A hypnotic and addictive game that will put your nerves to the test!

Sharpen your reflexes by preventing the balls falling to the bottom of the screen, improve your high scores to the top and collect ball skins and atmospheres.

- Increasing difficulty and ever-richer games
- Always different games, never get bored!
- Dozens of atmospheres and balls to collect (cube, ring, banana ...)
- Your brains and your instincts will be stressed until you lose control!
- An exciting and simple game with only two movements: slide to the right or slide to the left

Don't Let It Fall, the crazy game of PRIMITIVE FACTORY where you must not let the balls fall! How many actions per second will you achieve before cracking up? Do you really have the skills and the talent to trigger the impulse at the right time?
